title: What can musicians do to continue earning revenue in a situation like the COVID-19 pandemic where they can't tour? - Quora

response.answer_text: A band like Stone Temple Pilots are streaming a live home studio performance for about $8US. They played the whole Cor album, for example. Many artists are writing in preparation for when they can go out.
Teaching- which is what most musicians do for a staple anyway. The hard call is to motivate students when the scene may never be back to normal.
